# Ant Target Runner - VS Code Extension

This is a VS Code extension that reads build.xml files from a preconfigured location, displays all runnable Ant targets in a tree view, and executes the selected target when clicked.

## Project Status
- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

## Project Complete

The extension has been successfully created with the following features:
- TreeView displaying Ant targets from build.xml
- Click-to-execute functionality for running targets
- Configuration support for build file path
- Refresh capability for reloading targets
- Full TypeScript implementation with XML parsing

To test the extension, press F5 to launch the Extension Development Host.
